title: La Primavera
subtitle: Spring
meta_desc: Learn about spring in Spanish (primavera, flores, mariposas, lluvia) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish seasons, la primavera Spanish, spring in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
